name: THE WEDDING VELVET SANTAL | 35 Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Earthy & Woody.Scent Type:Warm Woods.Key Notes:White Miusk, Sandalwood, Cedarwood.Fragrance Description:The Wedding Velvet Santal 35 captivates you with its magnetic blend of gentle jasmine and white musk, accompanied by the velvety warmth of sandalwood, cedarwood, and benzoin. The creamy and woody base is reminiscent of a lingering embrace, rounding out this sublime scent as a testimony to unconditional love..About the Bottle:KAYALI's signature diamond-shaped bottles and opulent jeweled caps are inspired by traditional Middle Eastern oud bottles..About the Fragrance:Designed as an ode to everlasting love, Mona and Hassan created the Wedding Collection to wear on their special day. Inspired by the beautiful bond that unites these twin flames, The Wedding Silk Santal 36 and The Wedding Velvet Santal 35 are bound by the strength of creamy sandalwood. Also known as santal, this hero note grounds each scent while also glorifying the unique blend of decadent ingredients found in each bottle. Timeless when worn alone, yet amplified when layered together, these juices are made to be shared and celebrate love in all its forms.
ingredients: Sd Alcohol 40-B/Alcohol Denat., Fragrance/Parfum, Water/Aqua/Eau, Coumarin, Farnesol, Benzyl Benzoate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spray on your pulse points: inside of the wrists, behind the knees, the center of the chest, nape of the neck, behind the ears, and clothes for a more potent scent trail. .-For even longer wear, be sure to moisturize with balm or lotion before spritzing on the body. .-For a delicate diffusion, spray on your hair towel before drying your hair or directly onto your hairbrush before styling. ..Monau2019s favorite layering combos:.The Wedding Velvet Santal 35 & The Wedding Silk Santal 36 (sold separately):.For a captivating and comforting combo bound by the signature note of sandalwood...The Wedding Velvet Santal 35 & Du00e9ju00e0 Vu White Flower 57 (sold separately):.For a warm and seductive combination...The Wedding Velvet Santal 35 & Yum Pistachio Gelato 33 (sold separately):.For an irresistible and tempting blend of gourmand and woody notes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love perfumes, as for every season, I have a certain fragrance I love to use.  I have been using this fragrance for about two weeks now.   Key  notes of jasmine, musk, sandalwood, and cedarwood. Blended into a unique fragrance that burst of aroma that all you need is 2-3 sprays. This fragrance is long, lasting up to 4-8 hours. Yes, what a great duration.   Kayali is one of my favorite brands for perfumes. They have their unique glass bottles with KAYALI  brand logo that has a crystal clear top that looks like a crown to me which pops out as an elegant look with the feeling of a luxurious fragrance that has amazing blends, as for me great for this season. Even though I can use this perfume every day,  that's how amazing this perfume is.  I have gotten many compliments already. I'm picky of certain smells of perfumes, as for this one, it's on my favorite list.   Looking for a long-lasting fragrance that is not overpowering or strong. This is the perfume,  KAYALI Wedding Velvet Santal  to have as you will feel like that special day in your life every time you use this perfume.   I was gifted complimentary from Kayali and Skeepers in exchange for my honest review.

With a creamy and woody base, it features notes of White Musk, Sandalwood, Cedarwood and Jasmine and leaves you feeling romantic, captivated and embraced in its velvety warmth. I personally think it has a subtle, yet lasting scent that has a feminine and seductive feel. It layers beautifully with Kayali's 28 Vanilla and I definitely will be experimenting with layering with other fragrances in the future as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Kayaliu2019s The Wedding Velvet Santal 35 has quickly become one of my favorite fragrances for its undeniable elegance and timeless appeal. The creamy sandalwood blends beautifully with soft rose, creating a warmth that envelops you, while a hint of vanilla adds an airy sweetness that lingers all day. This fragrance exudes a warm, inviting aura with an effortlessly smooth and sophisticated edge. I particularly love how it layers with Pistachio Yumu2014the creamy, nutty undertones create a delicious twist. Pairing it with Vanilla 28 enhances its richness and warmth, making it even more inviting. Both combinations are stunning and offer unique scent palettes. Whether for a special occasion or simply to feel a bit more polished, this fragrance never disappoints. If youu2019re looking for a scent that combines luxury with versatility, I highly recommend giving The Wedding Velvet Santal a try! (Gifted by Kayali).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: KAYALI Wedding Velvet Santal has quickly become one of my favorite fragrances. As a 34-year-old man, I appreciate scents that exude sophistication and depth, and this one delivers both. The opening notes are rich and inviting, blending creamy sandalwood with warm vanilla, creating an immediate sense of comfort. However,what I love most is how it evolves on the skin throughout the day. As it settles, hints of spicy nutmeg and delicate florals emerge, adding complexity and intrigue. Itu2019s not just a fragrance; it tells a story that feels both intimate and luxurious, perfect for special occasions or daily wear. It feels like an extension of my personalityu2014warm, sophisticated, and a touch mysterious. It embodies the essence of elegance, making it a perfect choice for anyone looking to enhance their signature scent with a fragrance that resonates with both confidence and charm. Gifted by Kayali

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far, my favorite kayali fragrance! It's got depth but not in a heavy or overwhelming way and the benzoin is the perfect fit, it gives a creamy sweetness without being overly saccharine like vanilla fragrances tend to be. The cedarwood gives it a perfect woody smokiness without smelling burnt or tobacco-like. The sandalwood shines and really rounds the fragrance out into a smooth, inviting scent. It reminds me of amber musk by aerin except amber musk is more comfy/cozy and this is more cozy/alluring, it has a bit more of a come hither sexiness to it that I absolutely love! Perfect fall/winter fragrance that's suitable for daytime use and date night. It lasts for hours and even into the next day, the sillage is lovely, and it projects well without forcing your fragrance on everyone in the room. Layers really well with not a perfume, this fragrance is so delightful! Truly unisex, it doesn't smell masculine OR feminine, it just smells sexy!! Gifted by kayali

reviews.review_title: Warms to a woody amber experience
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time sampling a scent from KAYALI even though I have been seen their advertising for quite some time. KAYALI is known for their signature diamond shaped bottle, jeweled cap, and opulent fragrances - and you get the whole experience even with the 10mL sized bottle. Itu2019s beautiful, clean glass and comes standard with a sprayer, so application is easy and thereu2019s no dipping or rolling involved (as can be the case with some smaller sized perfumes).  The Wedding Velvet Santal 35 is a limited-release fragrance thatu2019s immediately jasmine and musk forward and then warms down into an amber, woody experience with a very light linger of soft powder. I think this EDP could be worn by both sexes for a moody, serious vibe.  Somehow I didnu2019t know that KAYALI is the fragrance arm of Huda Beauty, but knowing that now makes me more comfortable with the idea of paying a designer price. And of course Sephorau2019s return/exchange policy is great if you decide itu2019s not the scent for you after all.  I smelled this next to MG as other reviewers have stated, but I donu2019t think they are too similar. The mood may be similar, but MG is brighter and more feminine. I tend to lean towards more masculine scents and I can see a place for both scents in my collection.  This perfume was gifted by KAYALI in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_title: not what i expected at ALL
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Kayali's wedding line threw me for a bit of a loop. If I am understanding correctly (wish comments were permitted on reviews!), it seems that velvet santal is supposedly the masculine fragrance while silk santal is the feminine version? Alas, it's 2024 and we don't have to live confined to those boxes, but even if we did...could have fooled me. I do not get masculine energy from velvet santal at all; IMO, this is 100% unisex.  What I do get is a strong mental connection to the autumn months. I know, I know - again - it's supposed to remind me of weddings! Perhaps a wedding in the fall months then lol. I smell leaves falling, a cool breeze blowing in the wind. It's a very comforting fragrance to me, and VERY surprisingly for Kayali, while this one does start with a powerful blast, it mellows out into a much softer fragrance. Admittedly that characteristic makes it fantastic for layering.  Bottom line: this one was NOTHING like my expectations,  but I say that in a good way! Gifted by Kayali in exchange for my honest thoughts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have recently fallen in love with Kayali fragrances. This is my third Kayali perfume and I love them all, but I must admit I have fallen in love a little harder with this one. Kayali Wedding Velvet Santal is such a unique fragrance. I can totally see why Mona and Hassan chose this one to be a part of their wedding fragrances. It is truly an emotion which I will try to describe in words in the best way possible. First of all, this 10ml mini version is just so cute. It is way too pretty to be a part of my vanity. The scent is woody and musky with subtle hints of floral in the background. It just feels like a warm hug that you never want to let go off. This is such a soft and decadent fragrance. I love the notes of sandalwood that surround this perfume, I find it to be very captivating and sophisticated. This one is a unisex perfume, however, I think when worn by itself, it inclines more towards the masculine side. So I layered it with a sweet vanilla based perfume for an irresistible and seductive combination. I sprayed it on my pulse points and all over my clothes for a long lasting effect. The scent stayed on for a good whole day on me. My husband could still smell it on me the next morning. I mean this perfume is just AMAZING! I need to get my hands on a bigger bottle now! #Gifted by Kayali

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a warm, comforting & elegant fragrance. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Kayali's Wedding Velvet Santal 35 fragrance doesn't have a masculine scent to me. It could just as easily be worn by ladies. I believe the packaging should be updated to be gender-neutral, not just for men. It's not a bold, overpowering scent; rather, it's soft and delicate, almost like it's meant to blend seamlessly with the wearer's natural scent. It's light, cozy, and joyful. The fragrance transitions quite smoothly from the initial spray to the final dry down. Initially, it's more of a white floral and tea leaf scent. By the time it's fully dry, it's transformed into a woody aroma without the hint of pencil shavings. It becomes more complex as it dries, with notes of amber, leather, sandalwood, cedarwood, and a touch of tea leaves, lending it a sophisticated allure. It's perfect for those who prefer a more subtle, yet not too feminine, scent. It contains a hint of jasmine. The name Wedding Velvet Santal 35 is a perfect fit, as it evokes a smooth, velvety feel. It typically lasts around 6 hours on the skin and is overall a fantastic fragrance. Gifted by Kayali, but it is my honest opinion.

reviews.review_text: This scent from Kayali is absolutely divine! It is the perfect mix of feminine and masculine and truly invokes such a comforting yet sultry feeling. reviews.review_text: I am actually so impressed with this perfume! I wasnu2019t sure how Iu2019d feel about it since Iu2019m more of a gourmand lover but this is such a unique beautiful scent that gets better as you wear it throughout the day. Itu2019s definitely a luxurious scent and itu2019s perfect for a date night. This was gifted by Kayali in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Kayali. The Wedding Velvet Santal perfume is one of the best perfumes on the market. The scent is something that will have people stop and ask you what youu2019re wearing. I love this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Offered by kayali. Ufff!! Since when did I love these notes/ingredients in a perfume. This smells amazing, soothing but you can definitely smell the musky smell in it. The sandalwood too. Itu2019s not overpowering & it does not make your head hurts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Another winner from Kayali! I am actually really impressed with this one. The way theyu2019ve balanced the smokiness/woodiness and the sweetness is really impressive especially since most of what Iu2019ve tried from the brand is very sweet. Itu2019s a little masculine leaning but just sweet and ambery enough to be a good fall scent for any gender. This is not a typical fragrance profile Iu2019d go for, but was pleasantly surprised. Not a ton of projection but it can be smelled on the skin for hours. Gifted by Kayali

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There smells really good. Smells very cozy and it last a long time. And itu2019s not too strong to the point where you get a headache itu2019s very soothing when you come closer to the person has it settled it gets better and better. Offered by kayali

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I looooove this scent. Itu2019s sexy, subtle and the projection isnu2019t too strong. I just wish it lasted a little longer, but I also think itu2019s great mixed with other scents so Iu2019ve been experimenting, and doing that works a lot better for me. Itu2019s the perfect unisex scent. The bottle also looks nice in my collection. Another great hit by kayali. Will be buying full size in this scent. Gifted by kayali.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is so warm and cozy. Itu2019s classy without being over the top, and itu2019s perfect for special occasions or just a nice day out. It lasts a good amount of time, and I get compliments when I have it on. If youu2019re after something luxurious that still feels laidback, this is a great choice. Gifted by the brand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited that this product was gifted by Kayali! I love all Kayali scents and was so excited to try this. It is a perfect scent with a great mix of its notes - I feel this is very versatile and could be used day or night. I love that it can be used as a unisex fragrance too! I would highly recommend to pick this up while you can!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my FAVORITE Kayali scent ever! I don't know why everyone is so obsessed with the Silk Santal but sleeps on this one. I literally have 2 backup bottles. The scent itself: totally unisex to me. Reminds me of Nirvana Black (RIP) or even Mon Guerlain. Gorgeous, spicy, sexy. Gets me compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I liked it, i bought it as its the only masculine fragrance offered by the company. The tea notes are EXTREMELY high though.   Other than that i like it alot, exited for Tabacco Oud

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic!!!! Long lasting, smooth, creamy jasmine

reviews.review_title: Love it! Not long lasting though
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this for my wedding! it is definitely a unisex fragrance. The only complaint is that it is not long lasting. I have gotten a small version of The Wedding Silk Santal and they layer together sooooo well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ack!! I love Kayali fragrances but this is a HARD NO. The opening, on me, smells like rotting vegetable like it was rancid. It dries down ok but I never ever want to smell the top notes again. Also not getting any tea.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this and the other wedding fragrance in travel sizes as soon as they were released. I had high hopes that these two would have good longevity, but theyu2019re gone after a couple hours (especially this one). That being said, it smells wonderful, and I prefer this to the other wedding scent. It just doesnu2019t last.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty scent but faded after 5 mins. I wanted to love it. If you like skin scents then get it. Iu2019m contemplating whether or not to return it or not. I also purchased Vanilla 28 and Iu2019m not sure how I feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay let me preface this by saying that I really enjoy this scent. But it has zero projection and is 100% a skin scent. I also wish it had better lasting power. It is unisex, light, slightly musky, slightly sweet, and would be scrumptious on a man. I wish it had more projection. It is Kayaliu2019s softest scent by far.  wish it wa

reviews.review_title: Perfect for date night or fall/winter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful scent! Iu2019m very cautious with unisex scents but this one grabbed me at first spray. Purchased the travel size from Kayali but bought a full size the same day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so exited for this launch, but unfortunately this scent caused a migraine for me, and Iu2019m not usually sensitive to scents. So sad that Iu2019ll not be keeping this.

reviews.review_title: You need this donu2019t overlook it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t leave reviews but I have to for this one I came to buy a second bottle because this is heavenly. Itu2019s Unisex I was worried it be too masculine but itu2019s mlt BUY IT. Itu2019s the cousin of musk12 for sure!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my god, I know this is a unisex sent but lord this is just so sweet and sexy! It lasts all day on my skin, so creamy and seductive. I feel it leans more feminine but beautiful sent for anyone!

reviews.review_title: Creamy, Rich, Sweet mix of two favs
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is beautiful. Smells like a perfect mix between Killian- princess and In control curious- Britney spears (pink and black bottle, I don't think they sell anymore but I love it) Exactly if you mixed the two! Of course kayali has terrible lasting power which I took a star off for but the smell is soft and sweet and creamy, rich!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the sexiest, most alluring, elegant, and seductive perfumes I have ever smelled. Though it is listed as unisex I find it very feminine. This is a must for a special occasion or very special date night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Did not expect to enjoy this so much. I donu2019t usually lean towards unisex or anything masculine but this is so nicely blended and exudes sexiness. Perfect for nighttime but can be mixed with other scents to make it more casual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Blends well with Silk santal but on its own, this is sexy and very close cousins to kayali musk 12 but a more unisex woody creamy touch.  Very gender neutral in my book.  You can layer this with many scents you choose.  I really love this. Really nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s the most beautiful scent. Picked it up for my Fiancu00e9 but I may keep it. Sorry babe
